Texts.Chs: <译文: 我们有理由相信^red;<未知>^reset;违背霸权的意愿与香堤进行了非法贸易。不幸的是，因为香堤是前曲速文明，我们的不干涉协议要求我们消灭这个世界。这就是为什么你要服从霸君的原因。>
Texts.Eng: <Translation: We have reason to believe that ^red;<unknown>^reset; has illegally traded with the Shanti against the wishes of the Hegemony. Unfortunately, since the Shanti are a pre-warp civilization our protocol of non-interference requires us to sterilize the world. This is why you obey the Overlords.>
